email.title: This is where the magic happens.
email.line1: From today on, you won’t need another email client.
email.line2: Lily handles your email seamlessly and links them automagically with your Contacts, Deals and Cases.
email.line3: You will have all communication just a click away.
email.line4: To see Lily’s magic, add your

accounts.emptyStateTitle: Progressional overview of what’s going on
accounts.line1: Accounts are a collection of contacts within the same organization, company or group.
accounts.line2: You can easily see who you’ve been talking to and when.
accounts.line3: See the full communication history and gain insights about them, if you add them as an

contacts.line1: Contacts are the lifeline for your communication history.
contacts.line2: All emails, logged phone calls and notes added by you or your colleagues will be linked to them.
contacts.line3: Never lose track of anyone or anything, and add them as a

deals.line1: Track the status of your deals with this extensive overview.
deals.line2: You can see what’s expired and what needs to be done in the nearby future.

cases.line1: Here you’ll find what needs to be done. Keep track of your tasks.

dashboard.myCases: Here you’ll find all the unfinished cases.
dashboard.myCasesCompleted: Great! All of the selected cases have been completed.
dashboard.myDeals: All the deals you need to complete will show up here.
dashboard.myDealsCompleted: Well done, you’ve completed all your selected deals!
